titles.title: All Things Bright And Beautiful (Cecil Frances Alexander)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All things bright and beautiful, all creatures great and small, all things wise and wonderful: the Lord God made them all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Each little flower that opens, each little bird that sings, God made their glowing colors, and made their tiny wings.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The purple-headed mountains, the river running by, the sunset and the morning that brightens up the sky.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The cold wind in the winter, the pleasant summer sun, the ripe fruits in the garden: God made them every one.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God gave us eyes to see them, and lips that we might tell how great is God Almighty, Who has made all things well.{/lang-eng}
